tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeBenefits (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    health_insurance VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    retirement_plan VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    perks VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE benefits (
    benefit_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    health_insurance TEXT,
    retirement_plan TEXT,
    perks TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    last_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE health_insurance (
	health_insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	employee_id INT,
	provider VARCHAR(255),
	plan_type VARCHAR(255),
	monthly_premium DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE retirement_plans (
	plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	employee_id INT,
	plan_name VARCHAR(255),
	contribution_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
	vesting_schedule VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
	employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	first_name VARCHAR(255),
	last_name VARCHAR(255),
	employee_type VARCHAR(50),
	hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
);
